name: Stick Man Fight 3
description:
Test yourself for dexterity: dodge strikes, overcome many obstacles!

Lasers, blasters, grenades, flamethrowers and much more - everything will go to play.

Ready, Stick? FIGHT !!

Prepare to dodge, jump, and kill. This is a real lethal arena: here everyone is for himself.

Click and tap even faster! Grab bonuses, weapons and kill everyone around. Only the strongest stick will survive!

Make grandiose battles among your friends. This is the best fight stickman online!

FEATURES:
☺Pleasant graphics
☺Convenient operation
☺Bright stickman
☺Multiplayer
☺Killing games
☺Stick fight
☺Fighting
☺Tap tap
☺War games
